data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Afar that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Afar, Ethiopia

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Afar, Ethiopia, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Afar.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Afar, Ethiopia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Oromo, Kereyu people.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Afar, Ethiopia that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Afar, Ethiopia to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Afar, Ethiopia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

location.name: Afar
location.people_groups_list: Oromo, Gabra, Argobba, Oromo, Hararghe, Afar, Amhara, Wollo
